about_the_game:
⭐ Sky Conquest is a fun 3D platformer game designed to be played with friends. In this game, you play as colorful and cute characters who must jump, run, and avoid obstacles to be the first to reach the finish line.

🌟 Sky Bomber 🌟

Blast your enemies in this thrilling Bomberman-like mode! Strategy, speed, and precision are your best allies as you place bombs to destroy obstacles and defeat your opponents. Navigate through complex mazes, collect power-ups, and become the master of explosive skies!

🌟 Adventure Mode 🌟

Get ready for a colorful and challenging epic! Inspired by Mario classics, this adventure mode transports you into a 3D and 2D universe where every jump counts. Traverse varied levels filled with platforms, puzzles, and dangers. Master the art of jumping, discover hidden secrets, and face formidable enemies to restore peace in the celestial kingdom.

🌟 Search and Find 🌟

Rick has lost valuable items in his sky house and he needs your help to find them! This mode plunges you into a hidden objects game where every room holds concealed treasures. Explore detailed environments, use your observation skills, and solve puzzles to find Rick's lost items.

the Game's Features

  • Colorful and cute graphics that will appeal to players of all ages.
  • Simple and intuitive controls that allow players to focus on the fun of playing.
  • Fun cosmetics that will make the gameplay even more exciting.
  • Varied and challenging levels that will test players' skills.

🏆 Sky Conquest Features 🏆

  • Dazzling Graphics: Stunning high-definition environments that bring the skies to life.
  • Varied Gameplay: Three unique game modes for a diverse and captivating experience.
  • Get ready to conquer the skies and discover a world of mysteries and explosions with Sky Conquest! Download it now and let the adventure begin!

name: Sky Conquest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core CPU (something older gen, eg. 2017 Ryzen 2200g, i3 8100)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM (use like GT1030)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: In summary, Sky Conquest is a fun and enjoyable platform game to play with friends! 🌟 With cute graphics and entertaining gameplay, it's the perfect combo. Download it for free now on Steam and get ready to jump and have fun! 🚀🎮
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
